memberdef.argsstring: (string orbname, unsigned threads, long priority, bool mode=Device::INTEGRATED, bool update=Device::DO_NOT_UPDATE)
memberdef.name: connect

briefdescription.para: Connects the device with a CORBA and other GCS Services.
Stops all commands and goes to fault.

parameterdescription.para: As their name tell us is the configuration of an acquisition..

briefdescription.para: Instructs the detector controller to start taking the specified number of images.

simplesect.title: description:It is True if DAS is applying the configuration.
description:It is True if DAS is the configuration has been applied.
description:It is True if the CCD Controller is taking exposures.
description:It is True if the Acquisition system is in Idle mode.
